Single Trip Insurance Overview

Our Single Trip Insurance provides comprehensive coverage for your individual travel adventures. Perfect for holidays, business trips, or short-term travel, this policy offers flexible coverage options tailored to your specific needs.

); case 'geographical': return (

Geographical Coverage

Our Single Trip Insurance provides extensive geographical coverage across multiple regions, ensuring you're protected wherever your travels take you.

Europe

Complete coverage across all European countries including EU and non-EU destinations.

Worldwide

Global coverage including USA, Canada, Australia, and all other continents.

Exclusions

Some high-risk destinations may require additional coverage or have restrictions.

); case 'policy': return (

Policy Wording

Please review the detailed policy wording to understand the terms, conditions, and exclusions of your Single Trip Insurance coverage.

Important Policy Information

Coverage Limits

Medical expenses: ‚Ç¨10,000,000 | Personal liability: ‚Ç¨2,000,000 | Baggage: ‚Ç¨2,500

Exclusions

Pre-existing medical conditions, extreme sports (unless specified), war zones

Claims Process

Contact our 24/7 helpline immediately in case of emergency or claim

); default: return null; } }; return (
